description:
"Stay out of the fight from now on... You`re getting in the way."
Itsuki awakens his Photon powers and, with Aika`s help, defeats the Darker that appeared in real life. From there Aika takes him inside the world of PSO2 to a room on an ARKS ship. ARKS intelligence commander Kasura reveals to him numerous truths. Though Itsuki is confused by the unbelievable news, he understands what he must do.
Source: crunchyroll
